descriptions:
['DescriptionThe project of 29 floors rises above the green landscape of the legendary skyline of Dubai, you will be minutes away from the best places of recreation, restaurants and entertainment of the city.
The project is located in the already well-built JVC center with many parks, supermarkets and other places of interest in the very center of this “circle”, so it offers a beautiful view on both sides of the building.
The project is being built by a construction company with a high reputation.
Cost:
1BD (with boulevard view) - AED 649,000 / $ 176 839 (68 m²)
Enjoy the unique community lifestyle at Bloom Heights, where innovative design fosters the perfect balance of social and personal activity.
A simple method of payment: 25% in installments during construction and 75% if desired upon delivery of the property or in installments for 4 years!
⬇⬇ Down payment 10% -> 5% every 3 months, then 75% - for 4 years
Best deal for investment.
Expected rental income of up to 10% ROI, about $ 15,500 per year.
The expected service charge is only 11 dirhams / sq. foot.
No agency commission!
Equipment
The apartments will be delivered to the owners in the 4th quarter of 2020.
The apartments will be ready for rent: there will be an equipped kitchen, a bathroom, fitted wardrobes, floor, walls, ceiling.
Infrastructure
■ Modern gyms
■ Shared workspace
■ Pool
■ Private outdoor dining area
■ Sauna and steam room for men and women
■ Treadmill
■ Lobby bar
■ 7/24 security
■ Concierge
■ Amphitheater
■ Parking
Location and facilities nearby
To the sea 15 min
Emirates Hills - 5 minutes
Dubai Media / Internet City - 16 minutes
Dubai Mall / Burj Khalifa - 25 minutes
Mall of the Emirates - 10 minutes
Sport City - 5 minutes
Dubai Marina - 12 minutes
The Palm jumeirah - 15 minutes
Jumeirah Golf Estate - 7 minutes
Jumeirah Lakes Towers - 12 minutes
**** No agency commission****
■ CONTACT ME for viewing and getting floor layouts today
Olga Novikova (english/russian speaking)']
